alert.note: Alert for Jones; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 5:33PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Two strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Jones and northern Taylor Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 532 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking two strong thunderstorms near Merkel, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Wylie, Merkel, Tye, Hawley, Trent, Noodle, Potosi, View, Caps, Dyess Afb, Impact, Lake Fort Phantom Hill, Hodges, Kirby Lake, Stith and Truby. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 261 and 292. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
